message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice.  I'm feeling generous, but let's not drag this out.
Come on Bob, meet me in the middle!
This is getting ridiculous Alice, I'm being more than fair considering the inflation!
Don't be greedy Bob, we're both losing out to inflation!
Okay Alice, let's stop this madness.  50/50 is the only fair deal at this point!
